src/parallel/zsc-3d-src/init.f

00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Init
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : David S. Whyte [david(at)ihpc.a-star.edu.sg]
00005 !              Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00006 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00031 
00032  SUBROUTINE Init
00033 
00034 !  Common Variables
00035  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00036  USE Domain
00037  USE FluidParams
00038  USE LBMParams
00039  USE MPIParams
00040  USE MPI
00041  IMPLICIT NONE
00042 
00043 !  Local Variables
00044  INTEGER :: count, i, j, k, m, ie, iw, jn, js, kt, kb
00045  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: r, Af0, Ag0, Af1, Ag1, Ag2
00046  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: muPhin, phin, rhon
00047  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: lapPhi
00048  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, MPI_REQ1, MPI_REQ2
00049  INTEGER :: status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00050 
00051 ! Initialize counters
00052  iStep = 0
00053  tCall = 1
00054  now   = 0
00055  nxt   = 1
00056  eps   = 1.D0
00057 
00058 ! Set vtk limits
00059  NX = xu - xl + 1
00060  NY = yu - yl + 1
00061  NZ = zu - zl + 1
00062  NPZ = 0
00063  NPY = 0
00064  NPX = 0
00065  DO k = zl, zu, xjump
00066    NPZ = NPZ + 1
00067  END DO
00068  DO j = yl, yu, xjump
00069    NPY = NPY + 1
00070  END DO
00071  DO i = xl, xu, xjump
00072    NPX = NPX + 1
00073  END DO
00074 
00075 !--------- Set near neighbors and order parameter ------------------------------
00076  DO k = zlg, zug
00077    DO j = ylg, yug
00078      DO i = xlg, xug
00079 
00080        phi(i,j,k) = -phistar
00081        DO m = 1, nBubbles
00082 
00083          R =  DSQRT( ( DBLE(i) - bubbles(m,1) )**2 &
00084            + ( DBLE(j) - bubbles(m,2) )**2 + ( DBLE(k) - bubbles(m,3) )**2 )
00085 
00086          IF ( R <= ( DBLE(bubbles(m,3)) + IntWidth ) ) THEN
00087            phi(i,j,k) = phistar*TANH( 2.D0*( DBLE(bubbles(m,4)) - R )/IntWidth )
00088          END IF
00089        END DO
00090 
00091 ! Assign neighbor values to array
00092          ni(i,j,k,1) = i + 1
00093          ni(i,j,k,2) = i - 1
00094          ni(i,j,k,3) = j + 1
00095          ni(i,j,k,4) = j - 1
00096          ni(i,j,k,5) = k + 1
00097          ni(i,j,k,6) = k - 1
00098 
00099      END DO
00100    END DO
00101  END DO
00102 !  Fix near neighbours at edges (necessary because of ghost node layers)
00103  IF(xl == xmin) THEN
00104    DO k = zlg, zug
00105      DO j = ylg, yug
00106        ni(xmin,j,k,2) = xlg
00107      END DO
00108    END DO
00109  END IF
00110  IF(xu == xmax) THEN
00111    DO k = zlg, zug
00112      DO j = ylg, yug
00113        ni(xmax,j,k,1) = xug
00114      END DO
00115    END DO
00116  END IF
00117  IF(yl == ymin) THEN
00118    DO k = zlg, zug
00119      DO i = xlg, xug
00120        ni(i,ymin,k,4) = ylg
00121      END DO
00122    END DO
00123  END IF
00124  IF(yu == ymax) THEN
00125    DO k = zlg, zug
00126      DO i = xlg, xug
00127        ni(i,ymax,k,3) = yug
00128      END DO
00129    END DO
00130  END IF
00131  IF(zl == zmin) THEN
00132    DO j = ylg, yug
00133      DO i = xlg, xug
00134        ni(i,j,zmin,6) = zlg
00135      END DO
00136    END DO
00137  END IF
00138  IF(zu == zmax) THEN
00139    DO j = ylg, yug
00140      DO i = xlg, xug
00141        ni(i,j,zmax,5) = zug
00142      END DO
00143    END DO
00144  END IF
00145 
00146 
00147 !--------- Initialize distribution functions -----------------------------------
00148  DO k = zl, zu
00149    DO j = yl, yu
00150      DO i = xl, xu
00151 
00152 ! Assign the neighbours
00153        ie = ni(i,j,k,1)
00154        iw = ni(i,j,k,2)
00155        jn = ni(i,j,k,3)
00156        js = ni(i,j,k,4)
00157        kt = ni(i,j,k,5)
00158        kb = ni(i,j,k,6)
00159 
00160 ! Laplacian of the order parameter
00161        lapphi = ( phi(ie,jn,k) + phi(iw,js,k) + phi(ie,js,k) + phi(iw,jn,k) &
00162               +   phi(ie,j,kt) + phi(iw,j,kb) + phi(ie,j,kb) + phi(iw,j,kt) &
00163               +   phi(i,jn,kt) + phi(i,js,kb) + phi(i,jn,kb) + phi(i,js,kt) &
00164               +   2.0D0*( phi(ie,j,k) + phi(iw,j,k) + phi(i,jn,k)           &
00165               +   phi(i,js,k) + phi(i,j,kt) + phi(i,j,kb) - 12.d0*phi(i,j,k) ) )*inv6
00166 
00167 !  Chemical potential
00168        phin   = phi(i,j,k)
00169        rhon   = 0.5D0*(rhoH + rhoL)
00170        muPhin = alpha4*phin*(phin*phin - phiStar*phiStar) - kappa*lapPhi
00171 
00172 ! Set distribution function f to its equilibrium value
00173        Af0 = -3.D0*Gamma*muPhin
00174        Af1 = 0.5D0*Gamma*muPhin
00175        f(i,j,k,0,now)   = Af0 + phin
00176        f(i,j,k,1:6,now) = Af1
00177 
00178 
00179 ! Set distribution functiong to its equilibrium value
00180        Ag0 = Eg0*(rhon - 6.D0*phin*muphin)
00181        Ag1 = Eg1*(3.D0*phin*muphin + rhon)
00182        Ag2 = Eg2*(3.D0*phin*muphin + rhon)
00183        g(i,j,k,0,now)    = Ag0
00184        g(i,j,k,1:6,now)  = Ag1
00185        g(i,j,k,7:18,now) = Ag2
00186 
00187      END DO
00188    END DO
00189  END DO
00190 
00191 !----------MPI Section----------------------------------------------------------
00192 ! Exchange f values for ghost nodes (needed in "collision.f" within the main
00193 ! time loop for the calculation of phi). This takes values from the nodes where
00194 ! f is calculated, puts them into two buffers, and then sends these buffers
00195 ! to the corresponding ghost nodes in the adjacent processors, so that the ghost
00196 ! nodes are fully updated.
00197 
00198 !-------- Copy values of outward f from real nodes into the buffers ------------
00199 ! X direction
00200  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_east_rcv, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ1, MPI_ERR)
00201  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_west_rcv, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ2, MPI_ERR)
00202  count = 0
00203  DO k = zl, zu
00204    DO j = yl, yu
00205      count = count + 1
00206      f_west_snd(count) = f(xl,j,k,1,now)
00207      f_east_snd(count) = f(xu,j,k,2,now)
00208    END DO
00209  END DO
00210  CALL MPI_SEND(f_west_snd, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00211  CALL MPI_SEND(f_east_snd, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00212  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ1, status, MPI_ERR)
00213  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ2, status, MPI_ERR)
00214 
00215 
00216 ! Y direction
00217  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_north_rcv, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ1, MPI_ERR)
00218  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_south_rcv, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ2, MPI_ERR)
00219  count = 0
00220  DO k = zl, zu
00221    DO i = xl, xu
00222      count = count + 1
00223      f_south_snd(count) = f(i,yl,k,3,now)
00224      f_north_snd(count) = f(i,yu,k,4,now)
00225    END DO
00226  END DO
00227  CALL MPI_SEND(f_south_snd, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00228  CALL MPI_SEND(f_north_snd, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00229  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ1, status, MPI_ERR)
00230  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ2, status, MPI_ERR)
00231 
00232 ! Z direction
00233  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_top_rcv, zsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, top, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ1, MPI_ERR)
00234  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_bot_rcv, zsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bot, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ2, MPI_ERR)
00235  count = 0
00236  DO j = yl, yu
00237    DO i = xl, xu
00238      count = count + 1
00239      f_bot_snd(count) = f(i,j,zl,5,now)
00240      f_top_snd(count) = f(i,j,zu,6,now)
00241    END DO
00242  END DO
00243  CALL MPI_SEND(f_bot_snd, zsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, bot, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00244  CALL MPI_SEND(f_top_snd, zsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, top, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00245  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ1, status, MPI_ERR)
00246  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ2, status, MPI_ERR)
00247 
00248 !-------- Update values of and f in ghost layers -------------------------------
00249 ! X direction
00250  count = 0
00251  DO k = zl, zu
00252    DO j = yl, yu
00253      count = count + 1
00254      f(xlg,j,k,2,now) = f_west_rcv(count)
00255      f(xug,j,k,1,now) = f_east_rcv(count)
00256    END DO
00257  END DO
00258 
00259 !  Y direction
00260  count = 0
00261  DO k = zl, zu
00262    DO i = xl, xu
00263      count = count + 1
00264      f(i,ylg,k,4,now) = f_south_rcv(count)
00265      f(i,yug,k,3,now) = f_north_rcv(count)
00266    END DO
00267  END DO
00268 
00269 !  Z direction
00270  count = 0
00271  DO j = yl, yu
00272    DO i = xl, xu
00273      count = count + 1
00274      f(i,j,zlg,6,now) = f_bot_rcv(count)
00275      f(i,j,zug,5,now) = f_top_rcv(count)
00276    END DO
00277  END DO
00278 
00279 !-------- Save initialized data ------------------------------------------------
00280  CALL Stats
00281  CALL VtkDump
00282 
00283  RETURN
00284  END SUBROUTINE Init
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:46 2008 for ZSC-3D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
